item.title: HTC ThunderBolt Screams On LTE
item.description:
The HTC ThunderBolt, a smartphone with lightning-fast speed, embodies the next generation of mobile connectivity. It operates on Verizon’s LTE network with exceptional performance. Not long ago, having a smartphone with cutting-edge 3G broadband was a status symbol. Technology evolves rapidly, and the speed that impressed us a few years ago seems archaic compared to today’s standards. While 3G seemed remarkably fast at the time, its approximate speed of 1 Mbps pales in comparison to 4G’s 10 Mbps...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/htc-thunderbolt-screams-on-lte/
